Today's available plays: %s
Use %s to start (Available: %s) Free play unavailable for this quest
<font color='yellow'>%s</font> Insufficient amount available. Free play unavailable for this quest

You can equip <font color='yellow'>front unit</font> with the <font color='yellow'>Mod</font> when you clear the Mod quest.
Put unit who is able to equip Mod in front of the party.
To challenge Locked Quests, you will need corresponding Keys. We have prepared an<font color='yellow'>Ultimate Key</font>for you. Use this Key to challenge the quest.
Breaking Damage panels will cause damage to units. The unit in front with 'Damage Break' can break Damage panels without taking damage.
Junks cannot be broken by normal clicking. Use units' Skills or Abilities to break Junks.
You will take damage at the end of each turn. The unit with 'Anti-Virus' is immune to virus. The virus can be deactivated by Skills, or by waiting for turns to pass.

Breaking Poison Panels will make you poisoned. Breaking multiple poison panels will cause you more instant damage and deferred damage at the end of the turn. The unit in front with 'Poison Break' can break Poison Panels without taking damage.
Protected panels cannot be broken directly. Tap the protected panel to offset panel protection with 1 Tap count. Units with 'Protect Break' can break Protected panels directly when in front.

You cannot take any action if being hacked. Units with ʻAnti-Hackingʻ ability won't be hacked. When hacked unit is in front, you cannot take any action. Hacking can be deactivated by Skills, or by waiting for turns to pass.

Breaking Hacking panels will reduce your Tap count. Even if you break more than 1 Hacking Panel at one tap, the number of tap reductions won't change. The unit with 'Hacking Resistance' can break Hacking Panels without tap reductions when at front.
When in Darkness status, Panels will all turn black. Darkness can be removed by Skills, or by waiting for turns to pass.
Breaking Color Gain Panels will heal enemies. Convert panels by Skills, or try not to break certain panels.
Breaking Color Gain Panels will heal enemies. Convert panels by Skills, or try not to break certain panels.
Breaking Color Gain Panels will heal enemies. Convert panels by Skills, or try not to break certain panels.
Breaking Color Gain Panels will heal enemies. Convert panels by Skills, or try not to break certain panels.
Lock certain panels. Locked Panels shows count. Break Locked panels quickly. Or enemies will absorb them and cause damage or even worse.

Timers cannot be broken directly, and when count to 0 they will explode to cause damage. Tap panels that are surrounding Timer and with the same color to break Timers. Otherwise, you can onvert Timers to panels by Skills.

Multiply after certain turns passed. Explode and cause damage when countdown reaches 0. Worm Panels can be broken when units with Worm Break ability at front. ※ Even if your front unit doesn't have Worm Break ability, you can break Worm Panels with Laser.

When you break a Virus-infected panel, party units will be damaged. When a unit with Anti-Virus ability is in front, it can break the panel without taking damage. Even if the panel is converted, the converted panel remains in a virus-infected state.

Receiving this attack from the enemy will increase the number of turns required to use units' skills. Units with Anti-Cooldown Increase abilities can nullify the said effect with a fixed probability. If the unit has more than one resistance ability, the probability of disabling the effect is added up.
Clear quest to unlock Auto Play
The 4th unit in Auto Play can only be the Helper unit for your friends.
There is unequipped Mod(s). Choose Mod(s) to equip.
